channel.title: Minnesota AG Press Releases
channel.description: Latest press releases from the Minnesota Attorney General's Office

item.title: Attorney General Ellison sues Trump Administration for halting development of wind energy
item.description:
Publication Date: May 05, 2025

Wind energy provides one-fourth of all electricity generated in Minnesota and three-fourths of all renewable energy

https://www.ag.state.mn.us/Office/Communications/2025/05/05_WindEnergy.asp
